title: Super Bowl LI recap
itunes:title: Super Bowl LI recap
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Chris Wesseling, Gregg Rosenthal & Kevin Patra – recap all the action from Super Bowl LI which included the largest comeback & first ever overtime game in Super Bowl history as Tom Brady and the Patriots erased a 25 point deficit take home their 5th Super Bowl ring. Plus, the heroes discuss where this Falcons loss ranks in NFL history, and what the future looks like in Atlanta.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
